programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: (2012) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic, award-laden Western with Jamie Foxx, Christopher Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio and Samuel L Jackson. A freed slave searches for his wife... and revenge.

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: (2015) Sin City thriller with Jason Statham. A compulsive gambler who does favours for money just wants out of the Vegas life. Just one big win at the tables should do it...

programme.title: Boys from County Hell
programme.desc: (2020) Comedy horror. A terminally rural village in Northern Ireland battles a monster with a penchant for blood, released when a local landmark is bulldozed to make way for a road.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: (2011) The third movie in the sci-fi action franchise. The discovery of a spacecraft on the dark side of the moon sparks another battle between the Autobots and the Decepticons.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: (2019) Greta Gerwig's Oscar-winning period drama adaptation of the classic Louisa May Alcott novel, starring Emma Watson, Saoirse Ronan, Florence Pugh, Timothée Chalamet and Meryl Streep.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: (1993) Harold Ramis's classic déjà-vu comedy starring Bill Murray. A TV weatherman must relive the same day reporting on a clairvoyant groundhog until he learns to behave himself.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: (2018) Comedy. Mark Wahlberg and Rose Byrne star as a couple whose orderly lives are disrupted when they foster three kids. Based on director Sean Anders' own experience.

programme.title: Free Guy
programme.desc: (2021) Comedy action starring Ryan Reynolds. Guy lives in Free City. Free City isn't real. Nor is Guy. It's all a big online game. Can he take down the corrupt game publisher?

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: (2019) Star-studded horror-comedy sequel with Woody Harrelson and Emma Stone. A dysfunctional gang of zombie apocalypse survivors hit the road when one of them runs away.

programme.title: The Secret of Marrowbone
programme.desc: (2017) Psycho-supernatural horror about a family who've travelled far and wide but finally think they've reached home. But the house, and other residents, may have other ideas.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Mr Popper's Penguins
programme.desc: (2011) Family comedy. Jim Carrey stars as a work-obsessed New York property developer whose life is turned upside down when he receives a crate containing six live penguins.

programme.title: Ferdinand
programme.desc: (2017) Charming animated bovine road movie from the makers of Ice Age. A huge but gentle bull (voiced by John Cena) tries to get home after being sent away to a bull fighting ranch.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: (1995) Charming family comedy-drama about a clever little pig who forms a close bond with a farmer and discovers a talent for herding sheep. With James Cromwell.

programme.title: A Room with a View
programme.desc: (1985) Helena Bonham Carter stars in this Merchant/Ivory film as an innocent on holiday in Florence, where a meeting with Julian Sands leads to romance.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: (2008) Remake of the sci-fi classic with Keanu Reeves. An alien visits Earth to tell humankind to stop destroying the planet. But when he's attacked, he decides to eradicate us instead...

programme.title: The Lost City
programme.desc: (2022) Comedy adventure with Sandra Bullock and Channing Tatum. When a romance novelist is kidnapped wearing a pink jumpsuit, her hapless cover model heads to the jungle to rescue her.

programme.title: Our Ladies
programme.desc: (2019) Raucous teen comedy. A group of Catholic school girls hit Edinburgh for a choir competition, but they're more interested in debauchery than singing.

programme.title: A Price Above Rubies
programme.desc: (1997) Romantic drama with Renée Zellweger, Christopher Eccleston and Glenn Fitzgerald. A New York housewife struggles for independence in a strict Hasidic community. Sex/strong language.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Up For It?
programme.desc: Paul Whittaker joins Bethany, Jane, Keeley and Robert for sign singing. Mohammed Farah joins Roger on the basketball court to give him some tips. Plus sketches and VV. (S3 Ep 5/5)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: (1958) Drama. Jack Hawkins stars as Police Inspector Gideon, who faces outrage and danger in his quest to bring London's criminals to justice. With Anna Massey, John Loder and Cyril Cusack.

programme.title: The Electrical Life of Louis...
programme.desc: ...Wain Interview Special: Stars Benedict Cumberbatch and Claire Foy talk about making director Will Sharpe's eccentric biopic of artist and inventor Louis Wain.

programme.title: Far from the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: (1967) Julie Christie and Terence Stamp star in John Schlesinger's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's novel. Bathsheba is not short of suitors, but will marrying any of them lead to happiness?

programme.title: The Personal History of David...
programme.desc: ...Copperfield Interview Special: Director Armando Iannucci and actor Dev Patel, who stars in the title role, talk about bringing Charles Dickens' beloved novel to the screen.

programme.title: Nicholas Nickleby
programme.desc: (1947) Drama with Derek Bond, based on Charles Dickens' novel. After his father dies, Nicholas seeks the help of his cold, avaricious, scheming uncle. Predictably, it doesn't go well.

programme.title: Django Unchained Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Quentin Tarantino and stars Samuel L Jackson, Christoph Waltz, Jamie Foxx and Kerry Washington talk about making the western adventure set against a backdrop of slavery.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: (2019) Action comedy with Kristen Stewart, Naomi Scott and Ella Balinska. When an engineer blows the whistle on a deadly device, the Angels put their lives on the line to save the planet.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: (2003) Action with Colin Farrell and Samuel L Jackson. A loose canon joins an elite force to escort a fugitive to chokey. But the baddie's put a reward out for help with his escape.

programme.title: Red Sparrow
programme.desc: (2018) Jennifer Lawrence stars in this dark action thriller as a ballerina forced to join an elite force of Russian operatives, trained to use any means necessary to complete the mission.

programme.title: Songbird
programme.desc: (2020) Dystopian pandemic sci-fi produced by Michael Bay. What would society be like if Covid-19 had mutated into an even more deadly killer?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: (1993) Anthony Hopkins stars in this subtle drama about the dedicated butler of a post-WWI home whose loyalties are tested when the housekeeper (Emma Thompson) falls in love with him.

programme.title: The Last Hurrah
programme.desc: (1958) Satirical, political drama with Spencer Tracy. Ruthless mayor Frank Skeffington seeks re-election for the fifth and final time. But have his old tactics run their course?

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: (1952) Drama starring Ralph Richardson as a pioneering aviator determined to break the sound barrier, even if it means risking the lives of those closest to him. Directed by David Lean.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: (2017) Fantasy adventure sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Karen Gillan, Kevin Hart and Jack Black. Four teenagers are sucked into the Jumanji video game to complete a dangerous quest.

programme.title: Django Unchained Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Quentin Tarantino and stars Samuel L Jackson, Christoph Waltz, Jamie Foxx and Kerry Washington talk about making the western adventure set against a backdrop of slavery.

programme.title: The Killing Fields
programme.desc: (1984) Oscar-winning real-life drama. American reporter Sydney Schanberg and his translator Dith Pran are separated during the Cambodian Civil War, putting Dith Pran in mortal danger.

programme.title: C'mon C'mon
programme.desc: (2021) Touching black-and-white road movie starring Joaquin Phoenix. A journalist travels the US, conducting interviews with young people and connecting with his nephew.

programme.title: Hit the Road
programme.desc: (2021) Evocative and tender comedy drama tracking the ups and downs and round and rounds of a family on a road trip to get their eldest child out of Iran. In Persian/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: (1941) Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara and Roddy McDowall star in John Ford's multi-Oscar-winning period drama set in the mining communities of the South Wales Valleys of the 19th century.

programme.title: Outcast of the Islands
programme.desc: (1951) Director Carol Reed's drama. A disgraced trader finds a new life in a secretive trading village. However, his own greed soon brings trouble. With Trevor Howard and Ralph Richardson.

programme.desc: Distant Relative: Classic US action drama series. Thomas reluctantly agrees to chaperone Rick's naive convent-schooled sister Wendy as she enjoys a night on the town in Honolulu. S4 Ep4

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
programme.desc: Seven Poor Knights from Acre: Tales of the legendary outlaw and his band of merry men. Knights returning from the Holy Land believe that Robin Hood has stolen their emblem. S1 Ep4

programme.title: BattleBots
programme.desc: Round of 16 - Part Two: US robot combat series. Eight bots compete for the final four places in the sixth series World Championship quarter-finals. S6 Ep26

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: I Could Kill My Wife's Lawyer: Classic US detective drama. Theo sets out to prove that a detective's wife's sleazy divorce lawyer is responsible for an arson attack on a boat. S5 Ep12

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: Justice for All: Classic US detective drama. Theo agonises over accepting an offer from a leading law firm when a series of drug-related deaths overshadows his decision-making. S5 Ep13

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Limited Engagement: Classic US action drama series. An undercover Thomas befriends two elderly sisters involved in a hit-and-run accident and helps to save them from homelessness. S4 Ep5
